summary: Seriously, just give me a scene in Endgame where there’s a group of Avengers staring down this massive army with that kind of...
body:
Seriously, just give me a scene in Endgame where there’s a group of Avengers staring down this massive army with that kind of grim “impossible odds but we’ll fight to the bitter end” mentality…

And then Thor, Wanda and Carol just walk over and are like “you guys go rest. Keep planning how to destroy the gauntlet. We got this.” And then those three just proceed to wipe out the entire army by themselves, so casually that they’re having a conversation about something unrelated (”do you prefer flerkens or bilgesnipe?”) while they’re doing it and it takes like 3 minutes. Then they stroll back over to the other Avengers, not even out of breath.

summary: Can we all just talk about how "Last" Avengers: Endgame is? Like, for 10 straight years Marvel has been building up this plot...
body: Can we all just talk about how “Last” Avengers: Endgame is? Like, for 10 straight years Marvel has been building up this plot which all accumulates to this last movie. For 10 years over the course of so, so many stories, and characters and beginnings, and origins, and middles… It will truly end in April. Actors who have been playing these characters, their contracts are up. And, even though there is more Marvel movies to come, it’s all just extras, sub-plots. This’ll be the last Avengers movie. The last Stan Lee cameo. The last time we will see certain actors play these characters who are so ingrained in our minds that we can’t picture them being played by anyone else. Never again will there be a plot like this built up over more than a decade. It’s just crazy to think that a storyline which began in 2008 will come to an end.

Never again will there be a plot like this built up over more than a decade. It’s just crazy to think that a storyline which began in 2008 will come to an end.

summary: Avengers: Endgame Coca Cola Cans Revealed!
title: Avengers: Endgame Coca Cola Cans Revealed!
body:
#AvengersEndgame Coca Cola Cans Revealed!

Marvel has a history of doing promotional tie-ins with Coca Cola, and you’ll probably remember that Ant-Man and Hulk Coke ad from a few years ago. It looks like that will continue with Avengers: Endgame, and the special cans have leaked online.

Featuring all of the Avengers as well as Captain Marvel, these will be the cans you’ll find when you buy packs of Coca Cola in late April and into May…

summary: New Dialog Revealed From the Avengers: Endgame Shareholder's Footage!
title: New Dialog Revealed From the Avengers: Endgame Shareholder's Footage!
body:
New Dialog Revealed From the #AvengersEndgame Shareholder’s Footage!

Last week Disney revealed a clip from Avengers: Endgame to the attendees at their Annual Shareholders Meeting. Details of what the clip showed came out pretty quickly, but now there’s a bit more in the form of dialog from it.

Scott Ladewing on Twitter posted some of the dialog between Nebula and the Avengers, as there were some people doubting the details of the clip they showed. He also posted…

summary: I've been thinking about the Tesseract since seeing Captain Marvel yesterday and how the events fit into the timeline of the...
body:
I’ve been thinking about the Tesseract since seeing Captain Marvel yesterday and how the events fit into the timeline of the MCU.

I really hope that Avengers: Endgame is the last time they use the Infinity Stones.

It’s getting old that they turn out to be a plot device. Do something else.

summary: End credit scene for Endgame: Nick sternly tells Carol that she doesn’t have clearance to divulge classified information while...
body: End credit scene for Endgame: Nick sternly tells Carol that she doesn’t have clearance to divulge classified information while she laughs hysterically that he’s managed to evade revealing how he lost his eye since the 90s. The Avengers look on in a mixture of confusion and awe.

reblog.comment: End credit scene for Endgame: Nick sternly tells Carol that she doesn’t have clearance to divulge classified information while she laughs hysterically that he’s managed to evade revealing how he lost his eye since the 90s. The Avengers look on in a mixture of confusion and awe.

summary: Thoughts
body:
Thoughts

If you hadn’t noticed the reblogs by now, I watched Captain Marvel. In my honest opinion, it wasn’t as awful as some people said it would be. It was actually a pretty awesome flick to watch. Brie Larson did an amazing job as Carol Danvers. She was basically everything that I thought she would be in the film and more. I loved the action, references, music, characters, and comedy. Obviously loved the cat too. And the special effects were AMAZING! Of course, it’s not a perfect movie since it does have some flaws (story pacing, villian, ECT.), but overall it was really decent Marvel movie for me to enjoy watching with my family. If I had to do a scale out of 10, it would be a 8/10. Would recommend to watch, but if it’s not your cup of tea then that’s fine too. Not really here to judge just stating what I think about the film. So if you haven’t watched Captain Marvel yet, please watch and see what YOU think of the film.

P.S. MID CREDITS SCENE!!!!!! AAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!!!!

summary: Me BEFORE seeing Captain Marvel: I literally DO not know how the Avengers are gonna defeat THANOS! EVERYONE’S gonna die, and I...
body:
Me BEFORE seeing Captain Marvel: I literally DO not know how the Avengers are gonna defeat THANOS! EVERYONE’S gonna die, and I know not of any other powerful being who is as strong as Thanos. Endgame WILL BE the absolute death of me.

Me AFTER seeing Captain Marvel: hah. Thanos you little bitch, you gon die! Suck a toe

summary: So, I Saw Captain Marvel...
body:
So, I Saw Captain Marvel…

Spoiler free (hopefully) & no particular order…..

  • So I went into the theater thinking “ehh, I’m not overly excited”
  • But CHILE #shookington
  • There was hella applause in my theater #lit
  • The Stan Lee logo change in the beginning?? Tears😭😭
  • MARIAAAAAAA MY BITTTTCCCCCHHHHHHH
  • Lieutenant Trouble😭😭
  • Monica is a #SCHMOOD btw
  • Goose
  • “WHERE’S FURY” No Eyebrow ScarJo ain’t READYYYYYY
  • WHEN WILL THEY STOP CGIing PEOPLES FACES TO MAKE THEM LOOK YOUNGER!!!!!! IT WILL NEVER LOOK GOOD AND WE WILL ALWAYS NOTICE!
  • The gayest movies are always unintentionally gay
  • She had her hands balled up more than a newborn baby does
  • (which I understand it goes to her ‘nuclear fists’ thing but)

I think that’s it

  • Monica is a #SCHMOOD btw
  • Goose
  • “WHERE’S FURY” No Eyebrow ScarJo ain’t READYYYYYY
  • WHEN WILL THEY STOP CGIing PEOPLES FACES TO MAKE THEM LOOK YOUNGER!!!!!! IT WILL NEVER LOOK GOOD AND WE WILL ALWAYS NOTICE!
  • The gayest movies are always unintentionally gay
  • She had her hands balled up more than a newborn baby does
  • (which I understand it goes to her ‘nuclear fists’ thing but)

I think that’s it

summary:
How is Captain Marvel going to defeat Thanos?
Easy. She got her powers from the core explosion.
You know the core that was being...
body:
How is Captain Marvel going to defeat Thanos?

Easy. She got her powers from the core explosion.

You know the core that was being powered by the tesseract

Also known as the space stone

Carol has the power of an infinity stone

blog.description: I reblog a lot so check my 'mygifs' tag for my gif sets. Feel free to ask questions or leave comments! Also, please do not repost my gif sets! Reblog is better! This blog is not Endgame friendly, or more specifically not Steve's ending friendly.

summary: Dear God, I said I wouldn’t and I was pulling back from speculations for Avengers: Endgame, but damnit, I read about the scene...
body:
Dear God, I said I wouldn’t and I was pulling back from speculations for Avengers: Endgame, but damnit, I read about the scene previewed for the Disney Shareholders and I came up with a whole new theory for Captain America’s fate.

I typed it up last night, but my question is, does anybody want to read it?

I think it’s interesting and a new possibility I haven’t seen yet, but I would love some feedback.

Please know, that if I do post it, I will put it under ‘Read More’ and tag it with spoilers so if you don’t want to read it or be spoiled, you won’t be.

So what do you guys think? Want to read a new theory or should I just keep it in my back pocket until next month?

summary: Avengers: Endgame, i fratelli Russo hanno finito il montaggio del film
title: Avengers: Endgame, i fratelli Russo hanno finito il montaggio del film
body:
Avengers: Endgame, i fratelli Russo hanno finito il montaggio del film

In Avengers: Infinity War c’era non poca carne al fuoco, con circa 30 personaggi da gestire in una pellicola di due ore e mezza, eppure i fratelli Russo, che sono tornati alla regia anche del sequel Avengers: Endgame, sono riusciti a gestire (più o meno) il tutto nel migliore dei modi. Ora però devono dimostrare di esser stati in grado di gestire anche l’enorme sfida del quarto film dedicato ai…

View On WordPress
